name: DNB Bank ASA
bossPosition: Head of Corporate Responsibility & Public Affairs
membership: Finance Norway (www.finansnorge.no) which in turn is a member of the European Banking Federation (www.ebf-fbe.eu).
goal: DNB is Norway's largest financial services group and one of the largest in the Nordic region in terms of market capitalisation. We offer a full range of financial services, including loans, savings, advisory services, insurance and pension products for retail and corporate customers.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market
euInitiatives: As a financial institution with a global scope and an ambitious technology strategy, DNB is heavily impacted by regulations adopted at the EU level, spanning both banking supervision and capital market regulations as well as digital regulations.
